name: Lilipip
tag_list: animation, custom-animation, custom-videos, animated-videos, explanation, product, service, concept, flash, after-effects, marketing, lilipip, story, animation-studio, agency, open-source-creative, creative, production, custom-unique-training-videos, cust
overview: Ksenia Oustiougiva, Founder & CEO, on http://lilipip.com We make animated videos about products, services, and concepts putting stories into a form that help them go where they need to go. Unlike traditional agencies, we make business fun and deliver projects with a predictable price and a guaranteed date. We advocate an Open-Source Creative approach with transparent pricing, processes, and direct links to the people we work with.
